name: Asdivine Collection
description:
Reminiscent pieces from the Asdivine series joined into one!
Asdivine Hearts: The most adventurous and feline experience awaits in the origin of Asdivine.
Asdivine Hearts II: With a world on the verge of being frozen in ice, hearts unite once more!
Asdivine Dios: How far would you go to protect the world of Asdivine?
Asdivine Menace: Travel the galaxy to bring the truth full circle!
